title: Please upload the Residual Hazards file
description: The design risk register will have hazards which were not mitigated during the Construction phase.  These hazards will become the residual hazards file.

title: Please upload the Key Structural Principles file
description: This will be the relevant documents and calculations which are critical to the safe operation of the building.

title: Please upload the Hazards Relating to Materials Used file
description: This will be a document detailing any materials used in the construction which might be hazardous to health or the environment.

title: Please upload the instructions on Removing/Dismantling Plant and Equipment
description: This will be a document detailing any plant or equipment used in the building that will need specific removal or dismantling instructions for refurbishments, repairs, or replacement.

title: Please upload a record of the Equipment Provided for Cleaning and Maintenance
description: May include information about Mansafe on the roof, or abseiling bolt-on points, window-cleaning rigs, etc.

title: Please upload a record of the Location and Nature of Significant Services
Please upload the As-Built Drawing file
